title: Vindhya Pradesh
creator_credit: Mushir Ahmad, M. Bhavnani and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: The State of Vindhya Pradesh includes 26 of the 36 former principalities of Central India. This film deals with the development of the State and the people who depend on the diamond and limestone mines for their living. Also presents sidelights of its great historical past.
creator_credit_for_label: Mushir Ahmad, M. Bhavnani and Films Division, Government of India
